name: Calgary Catholic Immigration Society (CCIS)
description: A non-profit organization that provides settlement and integration services to immigrants and refugees in Calgary.

name: Immigrant Services Calgary
description: Offers a wide range of programs and services to help newcomers settle and integrate into the Calgary community.

name: Edmonton Immigrant Services Association (EISA)
description: Provides settlement and integration services to newcomers in Edmonton, including language classes and employment support.

name: Catholic Social Services - Immigration and Settlement Service
description: Offers a variety of services to immigrants and refugees, including settlement support, family support, and language training.

name: Care for Newcomers
description: Assists immigrants and refugees in Red Deer with settlement and integration through various programs and services.

name: Central Alberta Immigrant Women's Association (CAIWA)
description: Provides support services to immigrant women and their families in Central Alberta, focusing on integration and empowerment.

name: Action for Healthy Communities
description: Provides programs to support newcomers in building their skills, integrating into the community, and accessing resources.

name: Bow Valley Immigration Partnership
description: Aims to create a welcoming environment in the Bow Valley by supporting newcomers with various integration services.

name: Centre d'Accueil et d'Intégration des Immigrants
description: Supports French-speaking immigrants in Alberta with settlement services and community integration programs.

name: Grande Prairie Centre for Newcomers
description: Provides services and resources to help newcomers settle and connect with the Grande Prairie community.

name: Lethbridge Family Services - Immigrant Services
description: Supports immigrants and refugees in their settlement journey with language, employment, and community connection programs.

name: Lloydminster Newcomer Centre
description: Offers settlement services, language assistance, and community connections for newcomers in the Lloydminster area.

name: Sage Seniors Association - Multicultural Seniors Outreach
description: Provides support for immigrant seniors, including social integration programs and information on accessing local services.

name: Taber & District Community Adult Learning Association
description: Provides language and literacy programs for newcomers, supporting their integration into the local community.

name: Southern Alberta Ethnic Association
description: Hosts multicultural events and provides support for newcomers to connect with their community.

name: Brooks & County Immigration Services
description: Supports newcomers in the Brooks area with settlement services, language training, and employment resources.

name: Edmonton Catholic Social Services
description: Provides settlement and family services for immigrants and refugees, offering support through various programs.

name: Calgary Immigrant Women’s Association (CIWA)
description: Empowers immigrant women and girls through settlement, employment, and language programs tailored to meet their needs.

name: Edmonton Region Immigrant Employment Council (ERIEC)
description: Connects immigrants with local professionals and mentors to help newcomers integrate into the workforce.

name: Newcomer Centre for Wellbeing
description: Offers social, mental health, and wellbeing services specifically tailored to newcomers adjusting to Canadian life.

name: Alberta Global Talent
description: Provides career counseling and job matching for skilled immigrants and internationally trained professionals.

name: Windmill Microlending
description: Provides microloans to immigrants and refugees to help them gain accreditation or training required to work in their fields.

name: Calgary Public Library - Newcomers Program
description: Supports newcomers with language learning programs, job search workshops, and community orientation sessions.

name: Multicultural Association of Wood Buffalo
description: Offers services to promote cultural diversity and provide resources for newcomers in the Wood Buffalo region.

name: Edmonton Public Library - Welcome Baby Program
description: Provides resources and programs to help immigrant parents and their children adjust to their new community.

name: Islamic Family and Social Services Association (IFSSA)
description: Provides settlement services, social support, and resources for Muslim immigrants and refugees.

name: Adeeb Hossain Inc
description: Adeeb House
